org.treetank.page

Class RevisionRootPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.page.RevisionRootPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPage

    public final class RevisionRootPage
extends Object
implements IPage

    RevisionRootPage

    Revision root page holds a reference to the name page as well as the static node page tree.

    • Constructor Summary
